job.title: User Experience Researcher
job.description: Advanced degree and 5 years or 7 years of work experience applying and conducting customer centered research to validate product or cloud-based services features, functionality, user interface designs, future concepts, and drive product development outcomes.  Work experience includes software company performing customer or UX research, research agency, UI/UX agency or enterprise organizations’ UX team.  • Experience developing insightful, probing questions that resonate with both highly technical individuals through business minded end-users using enterprise software.  • In depth knowledge of user interface design, usability evaluation techniques, perception, cognition, task analysis, and experimental design.  • Experience with the creation and execution of online surveys and survey data analysis.  • Experience in understanding concepts, latest trends, best practices across consumer and enterprise applications user registration, authentication and first time experience and extracting valuable insights to drive forward looking roadmap  • Must have strong written and verbal English communication skills  • Excellent communication and presentation skills to visualize technically complex topics and make them easy to understand with customers, product management, product development, design stakeholders and company leadership  • The ability to learn new technical concepts quickly.  • Experience researching customer or partner needs with Enterprise platforms (e.g. ServiceNow, Microsoft, SAP, Oracle, Salesforce, Workday) or highly scalable and secure Software as a Service experiences.  • Understanding platform thinking and how shared platform services work and being able to drive consensus in volatile environment despite changing requirements and priorities.
